item.description:

Nov 9, 17:02 UTC

End time : 29/11/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Read-only for 1-2mn for each registries
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we rolling out an upgrade for registries.

item.title: [SGP/SYD/BHS/SBG/GRA][Object Storage] - RFC
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 20, 08:30 UTC  -  Nov 21, 10:30 UTC

Oct 27, 14:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/11/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 21/11/2023 10:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers must follow RFC rules to avoid having disruptions on their requests
Service improvement : We are planning to upgrade IPLB from November 20th to November 21th.
This upgrade will add support for TLS 1.3 as well as strict compliance with RFC7540.
Particularly on section 8.1.2 which implies that our services will answer http responses with lowercase headers.
Here is the maintenance planning:
- Start time : 20/11/2023 08:30 UTC SGP/SYD/BHS
End time : 20/11/2023 10:30 UTC
- Start time : 21/11/2023 08:30 UTC SBG/GRA
End time :21/11/2023 10:30 UTC
Related maintenances:
https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/wmynv3nz50nq
https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/27nm3jqxz19z

item.title: [GRA/SBG][Public Cloud] - PCI product shortage
item.description:
Nov 15, 14:51 UTC
Identified - Start time : 14/11/2023 22:06 UTC
Service impact : We wish to inform you of a potential shortage in our datacenters GRA and SBG, specifically in regions GRA5/7/9/11 and SBG5/7.
Due to high demand, there might be limited availability of resources for the following flavours: B2, C2, T1, T2, and T3.
We will get back to you as soon as possible with more information.

item.title: Public Cloud Potential Shortage

item.title: [GRA5][Public Cloud] Control-plane certificate expiration issues for clusters reaching a 5 years lifetime.
item.description:
Nov 13, 15:14 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 24/10/2023 10:00 UTC
End time : 26/10/2023 16:10 UTC
Root cause : Software issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 6, 10:27 UTC
Update - We has been fixed the issue for some specific certificates.
Our technical team still working to fix globally the issue.

We will keep your inform when will have more information

Oct 27, 14:34 UTC
Update - We started to fix the issue for some specific certificates.
Our technical team still working to fix globally the issue.

We will keep your inform when will have more information

Oct 26, 10:19 UTC
Update - The impacted customer needs to download a new kubeconfig (the ones download before will not work anymore).

Oct 24, 16:10 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 24/10/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : We are experiencing control-plane certificate expiration issues for clusters reaching a 5 years lifetime.
The clusters direclty impacted has been manualy fixed.
Ongoing actions : We are still working to prevent this issue to happen to new clusters.

Oct 24, 13:58 UTC
Identified - Start time : 24/10/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : We are experiencing control-plane certificate expiration issues for clusters reaching a 5 years lifetime.
Kubectl returns an error: Unable to connect to the server: x509: certificate has expired.
Ongoing actions : Diagnosis in progress with the team.
